titleStmt.title: Articles of high misdemeanors humbly offered and presented to the consideration of His Sacred Majesty, and the Right Honourable the Lords, and others of His Majesties Most Honourable Privy-Council, against Sir William Scroggs, knight, Lord Chief Justice of His Majesties Court of Kings-Bench, Westminster, as followeth.
titleStmt.author: Scroggs, William, Sir, 1623?-1683, defendant.
Oates, Titus, 1649-1705.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
